entry.title: You Are Out of My League
entry.summary:
Author: ivebeenbamboozled (brainwitchletty)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 547,907Chapters: 51/?Kudos: 1,385

Summary: The story begins with a new Robin to replace the old, with Nightwing none the wiser to being replaced at all, and suddenly he has a little brother within the same terrible day. It takes a while to accept, but Dick quickly learns this new Robin-- Jason Todd-- is exactly what Dick Grayson was always missing in his life, and in many more ways than one. Through the years with the team and working with the Justice League, Jason finds a place for himself and becomes a vital member of the Young Justice League while also becoming a vital centerpiece in Dick's life. And when all that ends-- when Jason Todd is taken away from Dick-- it's going to be even harder to put his life back together with that emptiness returning once more.. . .Mostly canon compliant story detailing Jason's introduction to the Young Justice League as Robin, his eventual death, and Dick discovering the mysterious red-hooded figure acting as Ra's Al Ghul's bodyguard is a lot more familiar than he should be.

That is how he end up living with Dick. Dick is conflicated about his feelings for Jason. Damian is now under his care and him and Bruce are still awkward around each other. entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 83,177Chapters: 16/42Kudos: 742

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham.Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave.The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running.Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human.Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.title: My little Robin
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,376Chapters: 11/46Kudos: 107

Summary: After Robin got kidnapped, ages ago, for the ploy of a love sick Talia, for proposing to Bruce in their twisted way, she'd come to Dick, desperate, alone, pretending to be broken.Dick, just fired as Robin, with a replacement lined up, doesn't believe one word she says, until she starts being honest. Until he sees a way to handle his hurt feelings.Three years later, she's back. Not broken, not quite as desperate, and yet honest, again. Honest how she's afraid of her position as heir to the League, with an actual male heir around. Honest about her wish to get rid of said heir.Dick has no choice, not really. He has to take Damian in. entry.title: Black&Red
entry.summary:
Author: JillSandwich (Just_VIolence)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,010Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 28

Summary: Jason and Bruce have finally started talking again, but their relationship is still strained. Bruce isn’t sure if Jason’s ready to be back on the team — not when the issue of killing still hangs over his head. To test him, Bruce sends Jason on a undercover mission with Cassandra Cain: infiltrate and gather intel on Black Mask’s gang, who’ve been making dangerous moves in Gotham with some serious muscle behind them. Jason assumes he’s being punished. What he doesn’t realize is that Cass is there not just for backup — but to keep him in check. He barely knows her. He doesn’t know what she’s capable of but he’s about to find out.

entry.title: Blind Faith
entry.summary:
Author: AxisMage

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 143,434Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 156

Summary: It's no one's fault but his own that Dick is sitting there now, cold and utterly miserable, and very close to freezing to death.It's no one's fault but his own that he let his heart and mind get away again. It's no one's fault but his own that he wanted for someone who couldn't and wouldn't be his, and Wally is right.Dick needs to get back to his life, start over and make new friends. That's all, nothing more and nothing less. Friends, Dick needs friends, and sadly (according to Wally), Krypto isn't enough.

entry.title: weep my sorry tongue
entry.summary:
Author: secondhandsun (forgetmesunflower)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,967Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 168

Summary: “What about you, Red Hood?” The magician drew out each word as he asked, “Tell us: what is your deepest, darkest secret, the thing you’ve not told anyone else?”His mind narrowed in on itself. After Dick’s… admission, several things came to mind, but really, he knew what his mind would conjure up, what his mouth would form, and Dick’s confession made him feel all the more disgusting for what he was about to say. He’d never planned to act on it. Never. He’d planned to take it to his grave, twice over. And yet–───Jason, Dick, and Tim are forced to reveal what they’ve never told another soul. They deal with the fallout.
